description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Chicken Pieces With Cherry Chipotle Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Barbecued Chicken Pieces With Cherry Chipotle Glaze
name: Barbecued Chicken Pieces With Cherry Chipotle Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue on medium heat. Lay chicken on a baking paper-lined tray. Brush with sauce. Place tray in barbecue and close hood. Cook for 40 minutes, brushing occasionally with sauce, until chicken is golden and cooked through. Serve chicken with reserved extra sauce.
